OOC: You replyed to me!? $h*t! Damn it...I must have missed it. If you can't
repost it then what post # was it?

----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2001 4:35 AM
Subject: Into the "Cybertronian" Fire


> (I'm still waiting for Orchid's response, but by request of Yan I'll post
> anyways.  And Airly, the Brotherhood has no gestalts, so none of them are
> around in response to your question.
>
> Also, who is in control of the CF, posting damage wise that is?  Just want
to
> know who to yell at.)
>
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Nemesis
>
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarte
r/
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen/
> Serpentor/Teufel/Unicron:
>
>
>
> Unicron flew alongside his newest creation.  Teufel.  In a language from
> Earth (German) "teufel" meant "devil".  It didn't really fit the nature of
> this newest addition to the Brotherhood ranks.  The Chaos-Bringer just
liked
> the sound.
>
> At first glance, most would say Teufel was rather bland and nothing
special.
> At a second and closer glance, the assumptions would be confirmed.  His
body
> was armored above average, and a few cannons were hidden inside his frame.
> He was far from defenseless.  Just featureless.  It looked like he had no
> mouth, audio receptors, 'nose', or optics.  No sign of a beast or
alternate
> mode.
>
> "Teufel, arm your missiles.  In a while we will arrive at the battle and
aid
> my followers." Unicron ordered.
>
> "Understood." a bland, monotone and overall boring voice replied.  A robot
> wouldn't want to get into a long conversation with someone with a voice
like
> that.  It'd be...just plain to boring.
>
> ===
>
> Demon Wulf was struck by a few laser bolts and growled, but he was close
to
> merging.  He fired a widespread of flames from his mouth, intercepting
four
> missiles heading for him from Silverbolt and Depth Charge.  The resulting
> explosions sent some light flames and small amount of shrapnel at Demon
Wulf,
> but the Vok creation ignored it to the best of his abilities.
>
> He raised his sword, firing off an energy-signature seeking missile at
> Silverbolt's abdomen.
>
> ---
>
> Flesh Ripper saw the inbound Demise and chuckled, slashing out with his
right
> arm's, his claws out and ready to show why exactly he had been named
"Flesh
> Ripper" (hence his claws are above the average animals...) at Demise's
right
> hand (assuming he's reaching with both arms).
>
> Simultaneously with his left arm he slashed diagonally up at the
Predacon's
> abs, the boosters in his feet charging up quickly ready to blast off at
top
> speed.
>
> ---
>
> Dark Claw felt several shots hit him, yet he continued, rising in the air
> rapidly in his biped form.  In his right hand formed a black orb of energy
> with the destructive capability of a charge.  The Vok threw the orb down
> towards Incarninator.
>
> ---
>
> Dark One had reached Hiss, and discontinued his firing upon Demon Wulf
> because of the ineffectiveness and the task before him.  "Hold on you
idiot."
> he chuckled to Hiss, taking out a few basic repair tools, getting to work
on
> Hiss, hoping no one would be cheap.
>
> ---
>
> Breakdown pushed up, five rapid optic blasts piercing into his shoulder
and
> two more into his right pec.  He stumbled back in pain, cursing and
returning
> fire with three optic blasts at the insect bot, making his way towards
Dark
> One.
>
> ---
>
> Pyro cursed as his shots did absolutely nothing to Abominus.  Of course,
if
> his fire balls didn't hurt Vehement, they certainly weren't going to hurt
a
> 'bot two or three times bigger than the Brotherhood leader.
>
> "Oh, slag!" he yelled, jumping quickly, the laser blast from Abominus
leavin'
> a crater and sending Pyro flipping through the air, landing on his right
arm.
>
> ---
>
> Hiss and Scavenger remained down for the count and in stasis lock.
>
> ---
>
> (Gonna wait for Rdhal to get back to continue fight between Hot Spot and
> Headstrong)
>
> ---
>
> Groove looked to Abominous and if he could've would've crapped in his
pants.
> Stunned with fear, the shot from the Decepticon gestalt struck him dead
on,
> sending him flipping back a dozen feet and crashing down.
>
> He had a large gash in his chest and he stood still, trying to recollect
his
> thoughts that seemed slightly out of reach.
>
> ---
>
> Blades saw Groove's predicament and pulled off his attack.  He armed his
> fourteen missile tube and launched off four missiles at Abominous' cervix.
>
> ---
>
> First Aid remained a charred mess.
>
> ---
>
> Streetwise dived to his right, landing on his side and rolling.  As he
rolled
> he fired off four blasts from his photon pistol.  He intercepted two
incoming
> missiles, one nearly hitting him and sending shrapnel into his face.  He
let
> out a yell and stopped rolling, covering his face.  A missile struck him
in
> the back and he went limp for a second.  Then he started twitching as he
> started to save strength for a second wind.
>
> ---
>
> Blasts strike Imprisoner and his entire frame shakes.  "Idiots.  I doubt
> they've even caught on by now." he said to himself.  He noticed the tide
of
> battle, but didn't want to completely give himself away.  Until he noticed
an
> insignificant robot open fire on Choran.
>
> He armed his launchers, firing off four more missiles at the Cybertronian
> Fire as he did an intense scan to determine the strength of the shields.
>
> The cannon on his form swiveled, firing off three blasts at Prowl.
>
> ---
>
> Predator painfully got to his feet, firing off two rockets at the
> Cybertronian Fire.  Weapons fire struck him and almost knocked him off
> balance but he stayed on his feet.
>
> ---
>
> Choran saw incoming missiles and simply fired off five rapid optic blasts
to
> intercept them.  He raised his rifle, firing off twenty rapid laser blasts
at
> Depth Charge's torso.
>
> ---
>
> Shockwave was interested.  Everyone was going at a relatively less
important
> warrior.  Unitron.  Since no one fired at him other than easily dodgable
> autogun fire, he decided to aid his comrade in arms.  He armed four
flares,
> launching them off to intercept weapons fire.  One intercepted
Incarcinator's
> shells.  One missed its target.  One going off prematurely to take out
> Zardus' missiles.  And the last but not least destroying the missiles
heading
> for Sun Crusher.
>
> He armed his own missile launchers, tired of saving fellow Decepticons who
> couldn't handle things themselves.  He launched off two missiles at the
> Cybertronian Fire, logic telling him victory was within his grasp.  Once
the
> shields fell, it would all be over for the ship.
>
> ---
>
> Autogun fire raked along the fire-red space fighter's frame doing little
> damage, and a flare from the same fighter intercepted two seeking missiles
> from the Element.  He armed his launchers, firing off two energy-signature
> seeking missiles at Endbringer.
>
> From his nosecone ten rapid laser blasts erupted as he rolled through the
> air, the energy heading for the Cybertronian Fire.
>
> ---
>
> Unitron's worries were down quite a bit when all that was heading for him
was
> fifty rounds.  He dived down and did a barrel roll, several shells
embedded
> into his wing and frame but not hitting anything to vital.
>
> A blast from another enemy pierced through his back dorsal fins and hurt
his
> velocity, but he was still fast as lightning striking the ground again and
> again.  He fired off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at Zardus' pelvis.  He
> launched one energy-signature seeking missile at Killfest and another
heading
> for Rhinox.
>
> ---
>
> Beeline fired ten rapid blasts from its optics, only intercepting three
> charges inbound for its creator.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch felt a charge striking him in the back, but he held his
ground.
> He turned around with a deep pain in his chest as some kind of liquid
leaked
> down his back.  He raised his scorpion tail.  Using visuals from Beeline,
he
> was able to deduce almost exactly where the cloaked enemy was if he hadn't
> moved.  He raised both pinchers, firing off four missiles so that the area
> where the cloaked enemy was would be the center.  The resulting pre-mature
> explosions from his missiles would hit that area and anything in a 20 yrd
> radius (including up and down).
>
> He began modifying his scanners internally to try and at least get a
fringe
> like affect for his attacker at least.  He made a note to add an upgrade
to
> his optic sensors.
>
> ---
>
> Injector felt a few optic blasts impact and he flew back through the air
> slightly.  "Slagger." he yelled, firing down two stinger missiles at the
very
> temporarily downed Breakdown.
>
> ---
>
> Manterror shook from shots as his exo-skeleton took all the hits.  He
cursed
> in rage, firing off two ion disks from both arms.  Two ion disks headed
for
> Perceptor, the other two for the Cybertronian Fire.
>
> ---
>
> Smokescreen looked to the Predacon, Killfest, and noted he was firing at
> Vehement.  He powered up his optics, ready to open fire, but stopped.  He
> couldn't take on Vehement alone, and whoever was firing on Vehement would
be
> helpful.  He would only take down Vehement's attacker when Vehement
himself
> were down.
>
> He raised his rifle, getting a clear shot on Vehement, who still hadn't
> noticed the Warrior of Light.  Smokescreen would wait for the perfect
moment,
> when Vehement replied to Killfest's attack with a barrage of deadly force.
>
> ---
>
> Vehement slid through the air gracefully, a missile and the EMP bolt going
by
> him.  He swung his left arm, piercing through the missile and causing it
to
> explode.  It charred from his left hand's fingertips to the forearm.
There
> were even some shrapnel pieces stuck in him.
>
> He ignored it though, raising his right arm that had a large barrel where
a
> hand, forearm, and elbow should be.  He launched off two energy-signature
> seeking missiles.
>
> He raised his left arm, a near invisible sonic wave shooting out at the
> Cybertronian Fire.
>
> ---
>
> Sun Crusher watched missiles heading for him get intercepted and he simply
> sighed.  It was a test of endurance, this battle.  He didn't need heathens
> helping him.  He raised both arms, launching four missiles down at
EndBringer.
>
> ---
>
> Reflector laughed at Streetwise.  "Take that heathen dog!" he yelled,
filling
> with laughter.  He raised his right arm, the double-barreled weapon
attached
> to it launching off two missiles from each barrel.  Four missiles spread
out,
> two energy-signature seeking missiles heading for Killfest.  The other two
> missiles were regular missiles that headed for the Cybertronian Fire.
>
> ---
>
> Scattershot flew hard left, easily avoiding the behemoth, Abominous',
shot.
> "Hm." he said, reaching into subspace for the appropriate weapon of
> destructive capability.
>
> ---
>
> Nemesis Enforcer touched down to the ground, rifle aimed at Serpentor's
neck
> as he began walking towards his enemy.  He fired a few shots, but the
snake
> rolled out of the way.
>
> As he adjusted his aim, Serpentor threw his plasma launcher at Nemesis.
>
> ---
>
> The plasma launcher soared true, striking Nemesis dead on in the face and
> sending him sprawling back.  "Take that batman!" he hissed, reaching into
> subspace and taking out his sword.  He walked briskly towards Nemesis
> Enforcer, sword at the ready to slice down and decapitate a robot.
>
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
